column4: is nautilus used to display desktop icons? i think i deleted it from the session dialog by mistake and now i can't see my desktop properly
and if so what parameters should it be running with? (system>preferences>sessions>current_session)
Yes, nautilus manages the desktop. I don't know the parameters cuz I turned the desktop off.
also, nautilus starts up with gnome and acts as a daemon to manage the desktop. You're welcome :)
